    • changeNounName

      public void changeNounName​(NounName formerNoun, NounName newNoun) throws java.io.IOException
      Add all the noun's coordinates in the list of formerNoun, in the list of newNoun
      Parameters:
      formerNoun - The noun from which we'll extract the coordinates from
      newNoun - The name of the noun in which we'll add the coordinates from formerNoun list
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
